titles.title: Tax Fairness for Tribal Youth Act of 2021
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to treat certain payments made by Indian tribal governments as earned income for purposes of the kiddie tax.
Tax Fairness for Tribal Youth Act of 2021

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Tax Fairness for Tribal Youth Act of 2021
This bill treats certain payments made by Indian tribal governments to children as earned income of the child for the purposes of the kiddie tax (the tax on the unearned income of children). This has the effect of exempting the payments from the tax. The bill applies to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2021.
